name: Michael Johnson
summary: Strategic operations executive with 17+ years of experience in supply chain management, process optimization, and organizational growth. Passionate about driving efficiency and scalability.

skills.specialized skill: Supply Chain Management, Process Optimization, Agile Operations, Team & Workforce Scaling, International Expansion

experience.description: Reduced supply chain costs by 25% through process automation. Implemented agile operations, reducing product delivery time by 40%. Scaled workforce from 100 to 500 employees, ensuring seamless growth.
Developed data-driven KPIs, improving operational efficiency by 30%. Led international expansion into 5 new markets.
